sentence.text: Patient 6 had a zygomatic bone aplasia and mandibular hypoplasia.
Ears were low set with a missing anthelix.
The left arm had a hypoplastic radius (Fig. 2l), on the right arm there was aplasia of the radius and thumb (Fig. 2k).
He had a congenital diaphragmatic hernia, resulting in lung hypoplasia, and died on the day of his birth.
